column3:
Eshana requests your help with preparing a balm for the infirmary.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Obtain chunks of mudstone from Mirage Creek.
Deliver the chunks of mudstone to Eshana.
Greetings, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. No pressing emergencies at the moment, but the infirmary could use a hand if you're willing.
There's a problem with bugs, you sssee─the biting, ssstinging kind. Our sssentries finish their watches covered in weltsss, and we cannot ignore the effect thisss may have on morale.

Even the ssstrongest incense won't keep all the insssects away, but mudssstone can be ground into a passste that sssoothes the worssst of the itching. Might you bring me three or ssso chunksss? You'll find despositsss of the ssstuff in the waters of Mirage Creek.
Were you able to locate any mudssstone depositsss?
Yesss, these should do nicely. Once applied, the balm worksss to alleviate any irritation almossst immediately.
It is a traditional remedy of ours, passed down through generations.

We do alssso have an alchemical sssalve made by your people which heals the bites themssselves, but it is in short sssupply. I would rather sssave it for the mossst sssevere cases, and rely on mudssstone for daily use.
